name: Typer Hyper
description:
Hyper Typer is a multiplayer game where you can compete in typing with up to 3 players in one match. If there are none available players or you want to play alone, you can also start match just by yourself, checkout scoreboard how you did compared to others.

Leave comment or review if you liked it! :)

 Credit to Tiny Heroes assets sprites:

https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-tiny-hero-sprites-pixel-art
